attributes.action: All personal data from UK citizens should be automatically autonomous.
attributes.additional_details: Failing to tick a box to opt out of the open electoral roll means the personal information of your household is readily available to all who want it. It doesn’t just stop with the UK Government either; your mobile phone contract, broadband provider and even your energy provider then pass data to third parties. That’s right – ALL OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS READILY AVAILABLE FOR A FEE OF AROUND £3 to cyber criminals, terrorists, stalkers and identity thieves… Well, unless you opt out of course!
attributes.background: This petition is to seek transparency and change in the current law - All personal data from UK citizens should be automatically autonomous and not mass marketed.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition in its current form as it does not include a clear action for either the UK Government or Parliament. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
